titleStmt.title: The supplycacyon of soulys made by syr Thomas More knyght councellour to our souerayn lorde the Kynge and chauncellour of hys Duchy of Lancaster. Agaynst the supplycacyon of beggars
titleStmt.author: More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535.

titleStmt.title: The supplycacyon of soulys made by syr Thomas More knyght councellour to our souerayn lorde the Kynge and chauncellour of hys Duchy of Lancaster. Agaynst the supplycacyon of beggars
titleStmt.author: More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535.

notesStmt.note: Written in reply to: Fish, Simon. A supplicacyon for the beggers.
Identified as STC 18093 on UMI microfilm reel 448.
Cambridge University Library copy imperfect; 2 leaves only.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 125 #7 (Bodleian Library copy), and at reel 448 #7 (Cambridge University Library copy, identified as STC 18093).
